subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias scored 4 minutes 2 seconds into overtime Friday night, lifting the host Devils into first place in the Eastern Conference with a 2-1 victory against the lowly Tampa Bay Lightning.
snippet: Patrik Elias scored 4 minutes 2 seconds into overtime Friday night, lifting the host Devils into first place in the Eastern Conference with a 2-1 victory against the lowly Tampa Bay Lightning.
